### [Readonly](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00007-easy-readonly/README.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-iYXSoNQa-nNTZYBrqsIq7XIMaYDUQYDACAAUTUUzUnK+2B+lUBwNUfR2sqoFxmdEIlLFDUNxtNOGVEA15FtkO9vv9QZDYe+v22khjvWruwIEymydTsTRzUVADU5MgigtVABxUpatjkTkMOh0HwSJF+jGGBgNPQSBpQrLAaBgEDAKygCAAfUPR+PR4gAE1ytC2kyIDqNAeT4-9xBt1YUx8pTLEvhUoqVeSoHjb8IAAbQABXqVQzHwW4UgAXU5FJwLgsABTAPcn0fZYnEqFpUDWHpMJPF8dzkXwoQ2AYwlJQMAEc2FQXADgDWFBmMCA+Qgfgpi8CAAHJuHfZA4AXRj-B5JxgAqBQJD4t8qM+fD5hVECiBYti6CSAN6MYpJP00b9UjFABGNIDi-bQjKwUy0jMsAULAbFcXxQkTNVSlShpDp6SgTNWXZc0uR8z5MERdZXk5chrX8PgiECOhUE5ACoF6ComFDIKeQdNCMKI092FmM5oQAZRxacHzy59X1AIhFWKhhbTCGC2GhCRMFwaT2nHSdp1nYB50XZdVzUddoGAPgJCKPJaogbte1WdrOuFbqpxnOcjUGlc1w3YA2o6gLMQgRUJShMIWgasYghyGcIAnVa+oGpctpGrcdyAA)

`in` が重要

```typescript
type MyReadonly<T> = {
  readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]
}
```

`in keyof` で 反復処理のような動きをする

---
### [Tuple to Object](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00011-easy-tuple-to-object/README.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-cXEACaOwC6MWwQiz8NFouGSOBcphQGAim1QYyQ+FICVwAB5QSl8P48KssAA+CDAYADQYpagtCAAbzu+zYhx242pByOJzO7xuDLej2ur1ZXJeHN5zx5D0uXwFIs+OwAvrQZlNuviAGocLAAdzi-FsuAAEigSAzMrhcGg2ONCXNKJkOmQ2B0ggBzYCwMAgYC6UAQAD63p9vp9n3wKBcEAAwg8INqsBCvX7Y56IK7dOicHDsAikaoUUhifsuGl-hDZGk+BhWM5mFtvvjNhTaFsAAqRZBbLgoYKVFzfb4M+tgGVgD1x2PIUwREPyUwxof+xMcUZBCLJykQACiAEcUIVvCuSaoIFKIP56qEdkJk-BLYVsFx7aZgChzBg2DtdIDljiNts9kzhWzf3z-1FH4-gBJYaDfRccQAOTbDtPy2aBvAAJm8K5vAAFl+eRQKBMAIPYZhgjgTYAGVCJIfAMAEaBxDwsCCOCJDPzI9tKIEJDaPwlYxhYijLk2LYFCI7whKQrD-gguigWxMYAFkOEGeDELuJDbjQu50NuIToHEnCzCTMEAQnf4BNoHdSVRddNwwLMcXTFRqDRMFMRk7BcW8KkaUODkvOZO5BW5cU-xZCV+X80LAMlIKuS+fdcXcszd0cqzCls+FEQc1Fkxc7jsBg9so3c5doAZZSkIZFDrgZdT0IZdC4oSqBzMzFKbNTLB7ORJyMSxXKsF4yiiqpQTCJ0hlsqxbTvBGxjuySHqGKYqV4s8RKLJRVq0rTDKuom1ysHkwYhpgUqTlUjlVNQ6qTk0jlNOm7S5r27SGtW753SJM82HgIYLJ+twgjAJco3qYNYTsnbMy2BDkO+DypSrd0QCnad4x6INcGyYMSP2E0UenBM3VAWh8RIzI2hwZhA2DNhKIfCw-ANI0TTNYALStG07RcR1YGAZw2FVKMSYgZU1XYOnzCWJnjVNc02Eta1bQdJ1oGAWmiklvxhdkoIcBDcmMGvW9TQgQ0ZdZ9nFa5+0XTdIA)

同じく `in` が重要。 `in T[number]` で反復処理をした P を使う。

ちなみに PropertyKey というのがあるのを初めて知った。
- https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/issues/19940
- https://www.totaltypescript.com/concepts/propertykey-type

---
### [First of Array](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00014-easy-first/README.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-1wbgAL4QAjoPDmHbCJ0IcWdkNuTDAPjYVDWTBIsBOiBeUulZYrGg9vtBNsd6xBF1BFb3CCPGD+7a3MJhTb73uE4LHztnrEXwTSRZA6BLivJtyF5HBPFDCB+zvIQ-wAoDH2fKADzfI920-c8-SfJNUw8RCX0PD9T0wvhPTkKpk2yGDSPNCioXwl4Nw8EcsBuPcoHxCdMAQORXwhHiyF6Ghz0aVg8GwUgKEoRonxoTiKh4vjsAEljhO-JsY15dY0gAGVQRJGig2ScxADVy11fh0E4dMAGVISFMzzPVSswFAGggRsjhVHOShDT6TA8GsRcjBKXl+UFYVRUwcUpRlOUFVgYAxEwRkPHciB6SZCAAqCpduGFPkBSFEVgDFCVpVldB5TgYAcuC-L0oAWV6c5jS86xZwMMKisi0rovKuKqqVFUgA)

**[Conditional Types](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/conditional-types.html) が重要**

```
SomeType extends OtherType ? TrueType : FalseType;
```

のような書き方をする。

サンプル
```
type NameOrId<T extends number | string> = T extends number
  ? IdLabel
  : NameLabel;
```

**T['length'] で Array の length が取得できる**

他に[infer を使った回答](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/issues/16315)もあった。
[infer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/conditional-types.html#inferring-within-conditional-types)

---
### [Length of Tuple](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00018-easy-tuple-length/README.ja.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#code/PQKgUABBCMAcEFoIBkCmA7A5gFwBYQHsAzCAFQFcAHAG1UkQUafoCMBPCAZwEt0CD0EABQABHnwEBKCAGJAuEqAsX1nYqtMPRmaIgK5jA8qrqogfoZA6wyBrhgAGpc4CSGQOvKgRQZAa8qAohkCADIF0GQHYMJ058DuqYCqDNaAK-GAmgyA0ermaFh4ADykAHw2gPnagKMRgOoMgH4MoYBADAYQgNHygBIMgA4MgFj-+eZV2Jz02GyUqBDYqJzUAIYQALwQANoA5C1t7f0ANBD9ALYEACao1BAAzGMT03MLABorU7PzEACa-QC6dQ1NnJTtAMaoG919--TqFcAicC+wqdD0AxEdsax7MssIUZs5G7AshxHBA7Tjnh6AEWAbEEVwlwGvcAyAp8Pz-LCgnAuCUIwhMiIomisKYtiuKEsS5KUhA1K0vSjLMqyTEsRAXHYH2b5XCxrT8fQQGytgsQ-n+1CxIO-bEFywwJOMioJO5lnATZdn-o5OpCmcLn6rc7kQJaXmjPQxpwZwCDStZiVJlBSb0IOUUxWKErxYlvkpWlGVBbgsT9Lg8zUAQEAAO7JtQMz9N5Jy7iAN63t2gCE1p4x6HoAwwzGO1t49rmoD0KKgDHkYAKt7WIAjoqAJDmfoBkGIbhsAkYxvGiYpmmsDAAunA1agSYZlmUCTTNgDRkf6gbBmGEacFGcYJsmqbppwBDUOh3D4eNEBeIAa3KeIATVGADIZy13WtG3PdtqaZtmuZAA)

**T['length'] で長さが取れる**

### [Exclude](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00043-easy-exclude/README.ja.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?ssl=21&ssc=1&pln=22&pc=1#code/PQKgUABBAsDMEFoIFEAeBjANgVwCYFNJEETSiAjATwgC0ALfRgOwHMIAKAAQC8HmWAlBADEgXCVAWL4jy2AJaYALghlMR2JjID2TMEWF6IgK5jA8qo6ogEV9A-gyAe+IuA7BkDR6oDOGQD8MgMYZAxQyArhg8ADNFjx8CAAeABUAGggAVQA+H0AkhkB-eUAKV0BtBkAtBkBABh8on0BrBkAnJUAohkBlfUAzBkB75UBfgMArBnt4n1CfQGkGQEiGQBM0wDRNQE0GQGiGesB87UBRiMB1BkA-Bm7AIAZTCEBo+UAJBkAHBkAsf5mfdfkAZyJ5SgAHIIAlfE3sBQgAXggAWUp-HAJggHIAQyeIAB8IJ--0BMTPi9QNfkq-XmE3xoCjxB+4vR+Be-+vzPR7XuEt73o+5bPluJo7ps8issobBfEw2CZuQfowuw7BCBcYLehoMi4AIkQAGJqLWmhMABMFwawMJIShfpAWAAC6oYpqmECAITWtjRq4gDDDIA6wxsRG6ZgKARBgoAx5GACre8SAI6KgCQ5kSJJkpS1KbLSjLMmyHJci8TCbAA7n63K8lAkkyYA0ZG9MSpLklSwA0vSTIsuynKwMAmwaDgw5aNsZkQIAugy2IAa3K2IATVGADIZNkqfZjmaS5HI8nyApAA)

ConditionalType と never の組み合わせがポイント

```typescript
type MyExclude<T, U> = T extends U ? never : T;

// ↓ 'c'
MyExclude<'a' | 'b' | 'c', 'a' | 'b'>
```

上記が確定する流れは

```typescript
('a' extends 'a' | 'b' ? never : T) | ('b' extends 'a' | 'b' ? never : T) | ('c' extends 'a' | 'b' ? never : T)
never | never | 'c'
'c'
```

なので

```typescript
MyExclude<'a' | 'b' | 'c', 'a' | 'b' | 'c'>
```

は `never | never | never` で `never` になる。

---
### [Awaited](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00189-easy-awaited/README.ja.md)
- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#code/PQKgUABBCMAcCcEC0ECCB3AhgSwC4FMATSZJM8kgIwE8IBZTAY23wCsIBlbAawHsAnTBAAUAAQC2TFqwDOPAZgCUEAMSBcJUBYvqoAO-XuOwz8qygFdsAG1xJsAOzAkVTiICuYwPKqDqAAU9BoxEBLhkAShkB6hkArBkBo9UAZBkBQxUBQZUBNBkBohgjAJIZASwZAOwZACIZAMQZAawZANeVAdP0EwBiGQAcGbMARBkBzBkB1BkBwhlzAaQZAIAZPCEBo+UAJBgrALH+AAx99Q3wAHgBRAA9McW0LfAAVam18AD5BwAsGatzowCEGJMAWDUAIFUBABiy8-PrAMwYIGbmF5dXjVJLyqrqm1o6SQf-cDISLgXvdZvNFis1hAALwQEZ+CYyXD8OwAc3WnRB0IASvgZKYrLD6NQMDgCIQpuCnlCNhBgMAIMjUbY0X9--RAKVpetdU7fwp0A0DIOTM9EO-p9BWw39-U1UjDVo1A934NZoPg29OP-q1+MVayA1DSN+BjT96MU49mNgy9NMff+Syw8TYZo1qe6Mq5UYhg9SBhno-DNaC8sCMS-NQ5SIuNeJ6kaRAgCE1pkckyYAwwyAOsMutSVpYCgCQXKAMeRgAq3qkgCOioAkObjpO5YzjIc4LjIS78Cua6urYMjoGGG5bl2EBO6kgDRkUkE4GlODKzvOi7LquCDADII1+dgiZAjHgC6DJkgBrcpkgBNUfyydltO6f+4HK6btuu5AA)

ポイント

**組み込み型 PromiseLike がある**

Promise じゃなくて PromiseLike な理由がイマイチわかっていない。

**infer を使う**

extends を使った三項演算子で infer を使うことで、 U を使い型の推論を使うことができる。

---
### [If](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/README.ja.md)

- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-xicVhGmig4kIQioEAAghAALxodAAHlGVAANBAAORkfF4--HVABbITB8TuOEIgDeEAAogBHJiZPEfpkqFZCAAF8IHQDwuFvAkBAbJBvUyft2xDKgWGANQNAFMAGwgZlRFQ8UAG0sAA1UMW-X8aAxJtsRJOVtQpOiKXJHESMA1lyJ-TJqMxKUZX5PFoBYmByRYsAAF0EzpWCWCQFUgPEOSPEgjxsJfellODcUm3bJgaBoJj5QpDcL0vCBAEJrcJ913QBhhkAdYZTO3a8wFALBDUAY8jABVvEpAEdFQBIcztB0nRdd1gE9b1-UDYMwwjYBBxYAB3KgPCjGMoA87zAGjI+1HWdN0PS9X0AyDUNwwQYAWD7NQuHbaEIENQBdBnCQA1uXCQAmqMAGQygry0LwqKqLSujWN4yAA)

ポイントは
```ts
C extends boolean
```

で C が true or false であることを示す

また、すでに何度も出てきているが、 extends を使った三項演算子(Conditional Type)

### [Concat](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00533-easy-concat/README.ja.md)

- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#code/PQKgUABBCsDMsQLQQMIHsB2BjAhgF0iUWJMICMBPCAQQwBMAnAUyoGkGcBnNAN04GsqACgACZZrAAM-DgDYAnFk4BKCAGJAuEqAsX3U4GHCmEJqTEQFcxgeVUjUAFI4eOAMpYGASwAOeCIDsGAAbV9HAoAOixMXDxfQCLUwAdTQCSGQGj1QHaGQE6GQDGGQAOGQGsGQHztQFGIwHUGQD8GQE0GQCAGQGUGbwTAewYIACYIQBMGb0BUfXjAdeVARQZANeVAKIZAQAZunsBjBkB9BkAShjTAG4ZAH4ZAfoZvQEDIwAJfOMAwDKzAahVAAIZABtMCwBEGQFlEwHQlOMAV+OLy6whAaPlACQZABwZALH-b3w+8TkI8CncmCAAJSYnAArgAbLwAXlQ4XwAB4ANoARgAugAaCCI+qogB8AG4IMBgBAmAAPf5YPBMOgQPBoCBkAEozE4wgfXy3XEQADirjwAAlQWRAOYMgC6PQCxUSVANEMLwAFng8O5OAAuYlfLBy4IAK04wTQDAA5sA4LBgNqcGAQMAjKAIAB9R1O51OiAVCpZQDNDLNAJMMcUAGFGAU0UHS7Q-aINajL9-rDsAiACqksnU+icCDMHB0TDgqg4DAUREYiAAVSTKboaYzWYwOYgeYLeIgMMRwVb8cxreCxdRtpAIbDzogaRSgAmGQCNDLMUv2B46IzbXABbdwGrzRgEAbwgAFEAI6gnDgzFbilMKkQAC+EAAZgw0AuIAByERrxCag-gpgYQ0g4CgvCucFOAfIwwgwThV1BdwPybLE0TrNNQPAqM-gBXBOBBGDEUIY9KTweFd33cF4XQOM8MLTFC1xCi8So7CTypfC9wPYi4TIosUTxCi0VxWioBw088II5iSIieE1zQK86Ugj9MXEyS8GkpgqNgzFuN47d6MEpiiJEhEWQadjYExAAWTiVIaTEjIgUyePROjcMYwiWNIpEH2RB9WUxB9YAfdirwPdDMTINA0A-PMvOM3zlMRNyPIsx8fMxfzAKYIKQrCjAIqi2iezAYkIGfThEHJXDiv0A0wDXUlyoYGDdLwjAIUPCBQXoJgr1cDAaVxXtpxnCBAEJrbx0kAYYZAHWGPqBznPLwCgblAGPIwAVbziQBHRUASHMZXlRVlTVYANS1XV9SNE14GAPNOAAdyYBhzUtOaICWuJAGjI2UFSVVV1U4TUdT1A1jVNYBuHBP9XEwb57sAXQZvEANblvEAJqjABkMrb3t2-afqO40LStG0gA)

ポイント

`tuple` は `readonly any[]` とする必要がある。

型にも [spread operator](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/variable-declarations.html#spread) が使える。

### [Includes](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00898-easy-includes/README.ja.md)

- [Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?ssl=26&ssc=1&pln=27&pc=1#code/PQKgUABBAcCc0QLQQJIDsDGAbArgEwFMBnSJRci0gIwE8I0cssIAKAAQGsa0CAzHDgEoIAYkC4SoCxfUQEMATrOk0wpEaoiArmMDyqsqgApaQDdpAZQyyAlgAcALoDsGAAYBBeYoB05zLkL3ARamAHU0AkhkBo9UB2hkBOhkAxhkADhkBrBkB87UBRiMB1BkA--GnRQRSFAJoRtG-SLv876nheL6vG+bQdN+fLtP+UAoRAQFLuyr4bv8R5Qq4+EeLwBCyBAABKpIITOXh-KRUJQUBfQDAQADc1YgMOo6NhAERhIAEwyAI0MnZhBxnH1uOPrKFOEAYNIgwbp8-ykPGnLWL8UYxlgvxUXOAIgmCuJwgiSK4uiWI4hS+KEsSZIUqCsjgvSUJwQQ9KOUpCZcmpIGadphDzkCdnghShmIvCJmYtiuKWUSaAkqeVK0gyUKMYMrkQu5KleRpWnfH5AIAIxQkUUIAMxQgArFCABsUIAOynrVjmIR0aUZYmqnqaBvl-P8hUQMVEBlRAlUQDVED1VCAAsTUpS5blQMp7VZV1uU9X1A0laeRRNc5rULR5HXeTls55b1RWlae+U7Uhe0Rgdy0+at-mhsmp7htIQGAo4gIpjNf63YtnmdY9J09VQNI0kWBLnYNFXVXVp6zX9TEA-dwPHdR-nOTDQ0jWNE2ChDUNoMjqXzXdmXo91-mzTjcOjQjyX-U5N3k4Dh3ZdTALvZ930pm9m7bru+6HrzP3JqTc3pftlNHVz-zhluO57geEAfdCfOvVCPMa+Lkuo7LnNPQVl0QAAPv1+ts2jcvG715v9ZdVvSxTS1U3bDBMKeOBrnwHg8s7bVA7boP+T7hC8P7eCnp7WCB6SbEiaJECAITWtiRIAwwyAOsMSeceJYCgNKECAMeRgAq3gEgCOioAkOY6vqhrGmawAWlatr2k6LrwMABJEAA7sR7qelAjJlwEgDRkbqBpGqa5pEJaNp2g6zqusARCQ+WtJoKcECMoAugy2IAa3K2IATVGADIZddT43zfz23zoel6PpAA)

ポイント

- ConditionalType と infer を使って、一つずつ Array を判定していく
- Includes を再起的に呼ぶこと。
